tool_description:
Stock Market Data API
MACD Moving Average momentum indicator
name: MACD Momentum Indicator
title: MACD Momentum Indicator

api_list.name: Get MACD
api_list.description:
API returns calculated 100 Day Moving Average momentum indicator for the given asset name(symbol)  
like: TSLA, KO, TLT, e.t.c..
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://macd-momentum-indicator.p.rapidapi.com/macd/AMZN"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "macd-momentum-indicator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://macd-momentum-indicator.p.rapidapi.com/macd/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "macd-momentum-indicator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
